R. 6, 82, 84), kAYcana, kAraRa, ketumAla, gaRqamAlA, candra, japa, dIpa, nakzatra (Z. 4 lies 105, 13 st. 106, 9), nara, nAma, pattramAla, puzpamAlA, prati, pramARa, Bakta, maRi, mandAra, mayUKa, marunmAlA, mahAmAla, mAlatImAlA, muRqa, ratna, vana, vandana, varRa, vAkya, haMsa, hema.
